content: Any chance we can get a UX update to allow one to reorder the organization list on the left sidebar of the Zulip desktop app perhaps via drag-and-drop? It seems the only way you can do it is to disconnect from all the orgs and re-login in the order that you want them in.
This topic was moved to #desktop > Drag-and-drop reordering of organization sidebar list by Alya Abbott.
